markdown:
While all goblins enjoy singing, goblin war chanters pride themselves on mastering the art of vocal performance. Their ballads and jingles are undeniably catchy, though whether they are actually enjoyable is entirely subjective. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10 [Goblin War Chanter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=235) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 181 **Perception** +5; darkvision **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +4, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6 **Str** +2 **Dex** +3 **Con** +2 **Int** +1 **Wis** +0 **Cha** +4 **Items** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (10 arrows) --- **AC** 17 **Fort** +7 **Ref** +8 **Will** +5 **HP** 16 **Goblin Scuttle** **Trigger** A goblin ally ends a move action adjacent to the war chanter. **Effect** The goblin war chanter Steps. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** dogslicer +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d6+2 slashing **Ranged** shortbow +8 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6 piercing **Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 17, attack +7 - **Cantrips (1st)** [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **1st** [Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) (2 slots) **Goblin Song** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The war chanter sings annoying goblin songs, distracting foes with silly and repetitive lyrics. The chanter attempts a [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check against the Will DCs of up to two enemies within 30 feet. This has the usual traits and restrictions for a Performance check.
**Critical Success** The target takes a -1 status penalty to [Perception](/Rules.aspx?ID=12) checks and Will saves for 1 minute.
**Success** As critical success, but the target is affected for only one round.
**Critical Failure** The target is temporarily immune to Goblin Song for 1 hour.
name: Goblin War Chanter

text: Goblin War Chanter While all goblins enjoy singing, goblin war chanters pride themselves on mastering the art of vocal performance. Their ballads and jingles are undeniably catchy, though whether they are actually enjoyable is entirely subjective. Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 15 Unspecific Lore : DC 13 Specific Lore : DC 10 Goblin War Chanter Source Bestiary pg. 181 Perception +5; darkvision Languages Common, Goblin Skills Acrobatics +6, Deception +7, Occultism +4, Performance +7, Stealth +6 Str +2 Dex +3 Con +2 Int +1 Wis +0 Cha +4 Items Leather Armor, Shortbow (10 arrows) --- AC 17 Fort +7 Ref +8 Will +5 HP 16 Goblin Scuttle Reaction Trigger A goblin ally ends a move action adjacent to the war chanter. Effect The goblin war chanter Steps. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action dogslicer +8 (Agile, Backstabber, Finesse), Damage 1d6+2 slashing Ranged Single Action shortbow +8 (deadly 1d10, range increment 60 feet, reload 0), Damage 1d6 piercing Occult Spontaneous Spells DC 17, attack +7 - Cantrips (1st) Ghost Sound, Inspire Courage, Mage Hand, Message, Telekinetic Projectile - 1st Bless, Soothe (2 slots) Goblin Song Single Action (Concentrate) The war chanter sings annoying goblin songs, distracting foes with silly and repetitive lyrics. The chanter attempts a Performance check against the Will DCs of up to two enemies within 30 feet. This has the usual traits and restrictions for a Performance check. Critical Success The target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves for 1 minute. Success As critical success, but the target is affected for only one round. Critical Failure The target is temporarily immune to Goblin Song for 1 hour.
